data.title: Connecting Oracle NetSuite with Gaviti
data.text:
To connect your Oracle NetSuite account to Gaviti, follow these steps:

Q: What data will Gaviti have access to after connecting with Oracle NetSuite?

A: Gaviti will have access to accounts receivable information and financial summary information.

Q: What should I do if I encounter problems connecting my Oracle NetSuite account with Gaviti?

A: You can first reach out to us through the chat option on your Gaviti account for assistance. Alternatively, you can email us at [email protected].

Q: How are subsidiaries handled in Gaviti?â€‹

A: Gaviti maintains a 1 to 1 relationship between an entity/subsidiary and a Gaviti unit. The linking process will result in the data of each individual entity/subsidiary being synchronized to a separate and distinct Gaviti unit.

In order for a client to get the full picture of a company that owns multiple legal entities, its customers will need to go through a separate linking process for each legal entity that exists in the accounting package.
